relevant_findings.abdominal_exam: Nondistended, soft abdomen with mild tenderness in right upper quadrant; no rebound or guarding; Murphyâ€™s sign absent; liver palpable 3-4 cm below costal margin with span of 14 cm at midclavicular line; spleen not palpable; no ascites.
